title: ‘I Secretly Planted a Giant Sequoia Tree in My Mayor’s Front Yard’
subtitle: A Redditor's amusing tale of revenge and giant trees was full of holes — and when we got to the root of it, clearly untrue.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Redditor got revenge for the removal of his beloved tree, Clyde, by planting dozens of giant sequoia trees around Redondo Beach.
